original_text: The king answered and said to Daniel, whose name was Belteshazzar, Art thou able to make known unto me the dream which I have seen, and the interpretation thereof?
korean_text: 왕이 대답하여 벨드사살이라 이름한 다니엘에게 이르되 내가 꾼 꿈과 그 해석을 네가 능히 내게 알게 하겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: to Daniel, whose name was Belteshazzar,
Art thou able to make known unto me
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내게 알게 할 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: the dream which I have seen,
